alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 1:15PM MST until November 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Soldiers Meadow Road, Kamiah, Oakesdale, Tekoa, Nezperce, Craigmont, Winchester, Potlatch, Plummer, and Moscow. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Idaho Palouse; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
